column4: uh oh looks like i did something dumb, grub i displaying 2 kernels, can anyone help me with this?
im nubzilla sry, how do i do that
what i did was completely remove fglrx restricted then installed envy drivers..then i realized i needed those restricted drivers for my atheros card, so i reinstalled them
you're just running a different kernel now, and the old one shows up below it on the grub menu. Normal behavior, nothing to worry about.
